filmography.title: The Lost Weekend
filmography.role_description: A struggling writer whose chronic alcoholism leads him on a harrowing four-day bender of self-destruction.
filmography.plot: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actor; Cannes: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Dial M for Murder
filmography.role_description: A cold, calculating former tennis pro who plots the perfect murder of his wealthy wife to inherit her fortune.
filmography.plot: A former tennis pro arranges the murder of his adulterous wife, but when his plan goes wrong, he improvises a way to get her convicted of the crime instead.

filmography.title: The Major and the Minor
filmography.role_description: An Army major who unsuspectingly protects a woman posing as a 12-year-old girl to save on train fare.
filmography.plot: A woman disguises herself as a child to save money on a train ticket and ends up in a compartment with an Army Major.

filmography.title: The Big Clock
filmography.role_description: A crime magazine editor who must solve a murder investigation in which all the clues point to himself.
filmography.plot: A magazine tycoon commits a murder and frames an innocent man, then assigns his best reporter to lead the investigation.

filmography.title: Ministry of Fear
filmography.role_description: A man released from a mental asylum who stumbles into a Nazi spy ring at a charity fête.
filmography.plot: A man just released from a mental asylum finds himself caught up in an international spy ring and pursued by Nazi agents.

filmography.title: The Uninvited
filmography.role_description: A composer who buys a beautiful seaside house in Cornwall, only to discover it is haunted by two spirits.
filmography.plot: A composer and his sister discover that the reason they were able to purchase a beautiful gothic seacoast mansion so cheaply is that it is haunted.

filmography.title: Beau Geste
filmography.role_description: One of three loyal brothers who join the French Foreign Legion to protect their family's honor.
filmography.plot: Three brothers join the French Foreign Legion to escape a scandal involving a stolen gem and face a tyrannical sergeant in the desert.

filmography.title: Reap the Wild Wind
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated lawyer who becomes a rival to a ship captain for the love of a salvage company owner.
filmography.plot: A ship captain and a lawyer fight over a salvage business and a woman in the 1840s Florida Keys.

filmography.title: Easy Living
filmography.role_description: The son of a wealthy banker who falls in love with a working girl after a fur coat falls on her head.
filmography.plot: A rich banker throws his wife's fur coat out the window, where it lands on a working girl, leading to a comedy of errors.

filmography.title: The Thief
filmography.role_description: A nuclear physicist turned spy who communicates only through actions, as the film contains no dialogue.
filmography.plot: An atomic scientist working for a foreign power finds himself on the run from the FBI in this dialogue-free thriller.

filmography.title: X: The Man with the X-ray Eyes
filmography.role_description: A scientist who develops eye drops that allow him to see through objects, eventually driving him mad.
filmography.plot: A doctor uses special eye drops to give himself x-ray vision, but the new power has disastrous consequences.

filmography.title: Panic in Year Zero!
filmography.role_description: A father who must protect his family and fight for survival after a nuclear attack devastates Los Angeles; also directed by Milland.
filmography.plot: A family leaves Los Angeles for a fishing trip just before a nuclear bomb destroys the city, forcing them to survive in a lawless world.

filmography.title: It Happens Every Spring
filmography.role: Prof. Vernon K. Simpson / King Kelly
filmography.role_description: A chemistry professor who accidentally discovers a formula that repels wood, becoming an unhittable baseball pitcher.
filmography.plot: A college professor discovers a wood-repellent formula and uses it to become a major league baseball pitcher.

filmography.title: Golden Earrings
filmography.role_description: A British officer hiding from the Nazis who is helped by a gypsy woman, disguising himself to escape.
filmography.plot: A British colonel escapes the Nazis with the help of a gypsy woman who disguises him and takes him across the country.

filmography.title: So Evil My Love
filmography.role_description: A charming but manipulative con artist who seduces a widow and leads her into a life of crime and murder.
filmography.plot: A missionary's widow falls in love with a charismatic artist who leads her into a web of blackmail and murder.

filmography.title: California
filmography.role_description: An army deserter who becomes a wagon train guide and clashes with a corrupt town boss in the Gold Rush.
filmography.plot: A wagon train guide and a saloon singer team up to fight a corrupt politician in California during the Gold Rush.

filmography.title: The Jungle Princess
filmography.role_description: An explorer in Malaya who is rescued by a beautiful jungle girl and her tiger; the film that made Dorothy Lamour a star.
filmography.plot: An explorer is injured in the jungle and nursed back to health by a native girl who has a pet tiger.

filmography.title: Three Smart Girls
filmography.role_description: A wealthy lord who gets caught up in the schemes of three sisters trying to reunite their divorced parents.
filmography.plot: Three sisters travel to New York to stop their father from marrying a gold digger and reunite him with their mother.

filmography.title: Skylark
filmography.role_description: An advertising executive whose wife feels neglected, leading her to flirt with another man to get his attention.
filmography.plot: A neglected wife considers leaving her workaholic husband for a carefree attorney.

filmography.title: I Wanted Wings
filmography.role_description: A wealthy young man who joins the Army Air Corps and competes with two other recruits during training.
filmography.plot: Three young men from different backgrounds join the Air Corps and vie for their wings and the same girl.

filmography.title: Lady in the Dark
filmography.role_description: An advertising manager at a fashion magazine who constantly clashes with his female boss, hiding a mutual attraction.
filmography.plot: A successful magazine editor undergoes psychoanalysis to understand her unhappiness and vivid dreams.

filmography.title: Kitty
filmography.role_description: An impoverished aristocrat who transforms a cockney street urchin into a lady to marry her off for money.
filmography.plot: A gutter snipe in 18th-century London is groomed by a nobleman to marry into wealth and status.

filmography.title: Arise, My Love
filmography.role_description: An American pilot fighting in the Spanish Civil War who is saved from execution by a female reporter.
filmography.plot: A reporter saves a pilot from a firing squad in Spain, and they fall in love while covering the start of WWII.

filmography.title: Alias Nick Beal
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, devil-like stranger who tempts an honest district attorney with power and success in exchange for his soul.
filmography.plot: An honest politician is corrupted by a mysterious stranger who offers him help in exchange for moral compromises.

filmography.title: Love Story
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, rigid father who disowns his son for marrying a working-class girl, later regretting his coldness.
filmography.plot: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.
